nodes.text: Point Rain was the name that the Galactic Republic gave to its main staging area on Geonosis during the Second Battle of Geonosis of the Clone Wars. It was located a short distance from the ray shield generator that was protecting Archduke Poggle the Lesser's battle droid factories. It was a heavily bombarded landing point, and only Obi-Wan Kenobi's forces had made it, but his gunship had been shot down and he was seriously injured.
